answerText: Seascape[10] This modern American playwright wrote Seascape, as well as Who's Afraid of Virginia Woolf?
heading: Terrapin |2013 | Editors 3 - FINAL | 2 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This work begins with the couple Charlie and Nancy relaxing and sees Leslie and Sarah, a pair of giant lizards emerge from the waters. For 10 points each: [10] Identify this play which culminates with a discussion about the progress of human evolution.
